external_games.name: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type

name: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type
storyline: The town of Reinbald is said to bring happiness to all those who stumble across it. Hugo, a wandering dungeon maker, drops in one day and is roped into the service of the mayor. Monsters are threatening the peace of the town so Hugo’s job is to trap, plunder and kill them by creating elaborate traps in the form of dungeons.
summary: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type is a Role-Playing game, developed by Global A and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2009.
